base_description: Rectangular sliding window, gray frame, modern style.
part_description: Two glass panels, one fixed and one sliding, encased in a rectangular gray frame with a track at the bottom.
internal_interaction_description: The sliding panel moves horizontally along the bottom track, allowing it to overlap with the fixed panel. The frame holds both panels securely, enabling smooth movement and providing structural support.
external_interaction_description: The window can be opened or closed by sliding the movable panel, allowing light and air to enter. It provides a barrier against weather and noise while offering visibility to the outside environment.
